project_name: Real-Time Chat and Video Calling Application

items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Implement a feature that allows users to send and receive text messages instantly.
acceptance_criteria: Messages are delivered to recipients within 1 second under normal network conditions
Messages appear in the chat interface without requiring a page refresh
Sent messages show delivery and read receipts
non_functional: System should support at least 10,000 concurrent users

items.title: Video Calling
items.description: Enable one-to-one and group video calls with real-time audio and video streaming.
acceptance_criteria: Users can initiate and receive video calls from their contacts
Video and audio streams have less than 300ms latency under normal network conditions
Video calls can support at least 4 participants simultaneously
non_functional: Adaptive bitrate streaming for varying network conditions

notes: Assumed the requirement includes both one-to-one and group communication for text and video. Specific platforms (web, mobile) and integration details were not provided.
